access: Characters from Nex have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oozepick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1812)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 306</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Nex have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can pour this silver ooze into a lock or similar mechanism to create a set of malleable lockpicks and tools that conform to internal mechanisms. The ooze is treated as a set of [thieves' tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) that last for 1 hour and provide a +2 item bonus to [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to [Pick Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70) or [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=69) against the mechanism into which they were first poured.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Oozepick
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 306</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Oozepick (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 306</row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3, and the tools last for 8 hours.
